response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you, worth $800,000. My proposal is to offer this product to you at a special price of $750,000, which I believe is a fair and advantageous deal considering its worth and the benefits it can bring to you. I am confident that this investment will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 750000}
